Title: Hellsing: Digest for Freaks
Description: ['This OVA is a summary of the first three episodes of Hellsing, with the animation style of Hellsing Ultimate and following the events of the Hellsing manga.']
Related: ['Adaptation: Blood+', 'Alternative version: Blood: The Last Vampire', 'Other: Blood-C']
Characters: ['Alucard', 'Victoria, Seras', 'Fairbrook Wingates Hellsing, Integra', 'Anderson, Alexander', 'Dornez, Walter C.', 'Cheddar Priest']
